tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rachayta was excellent. She was very kind and gentle to my child and explained everything peacefully and calmly even though my daughter was crying , she never got irritated ,was extremely loving at pacifying her and most importantly she gave us treatment options and it felt like an informed decision. Will definitely be going back to her for all my child’s needs. Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Rachayta was so good with my 20mo daughter. She was so patient and did a complete check up without my daughter fussing. 
She explained everything clearly and addressed every doubt I had.
Would highly recommend her for babies/toddlers dental check ups and any dental related concerns. She is also very approachable and available to answer queries

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Rachayta has been very professional yet friendly snd patient while working with our anxious young child. She took the time and effort to build a warm relationship with our son. She is very good at her work and completes the work quickly and efficiently. Thank you Dr Rachayta!!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. It’s been an absolute pleasure seeing Nathan !!

review: Dr. Rachayta took us in right away, and that too after scheduling us last minute due to our schedule change. In the appointment, I was impressed with her gentle and kind bedside manner. She made my son smile and feel generally at ease! She was very patient to learn about our family, history, and answer all questions. Thank you for the beautiful array to my son’s dental hygiene journey!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Rachayta made my 6 yr old's first dental checkup visit very happy and memorable. Dr. Is very friendly and works on kids' fear of dental care /treatment patiently. She answered everything that my daughter asked the explaination for without losing patience, convinced her for a small cavity filling and did a great job with it. My daughter is looking forward to the 6 monthly check up. She even gave my daughter a lil gift which made the experience even special for her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Rachayta is friendly with kids which makes treatment easy.
She is genuine and keeps in touch for getting an update on status of recovery which shows her caring nature for kids.
I would recommend her treatment to all the patients suffering from dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My daughter is four years old ...who had to do some fillings and some more dental work... understanding the kids are always scared of doc.... but Dr Rachayta...is so kind and patient with kids she makes them comfortable and explained us the do and don't .......I would recommend this doctor for every kid with dental issues...
..
reply_text: Thank you so much. Been an absolute pleasure seeing Megan 🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My 7 year old was getting his lower front teeth in a crooked manner. Dr rachayta explained the reasons why this happens. With daily exercises at home, weekly visits to her clinic (which my someone really looks forward to) and a simple appliance to wear in his mouth at nught, in just 3 months we can see a drastic imprvement in his face. Thanks doc
